name: Qliphort Monolith
effectText:
Unhandled exception at 0x1i-666 in qliphort.exe: Access violation writing location 0x00-000
Continue, ignoring this error? ＜Y／N＞...[ ]
Xlmgzxg drgs gsv Hzxivw Givv rh uliyrwwvm. Gsv hxlfitv szh yvvm fmovzhsvw.
pendEffect: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Qli" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if you Tribute Summoned this turn: You can draw a number of cards equal to the number of "Qli" monsters you Tributed for Tribute Summons this turn.
